question: Which among the following statements is correct about the Prime Minister of India?
option1: He cannot dismiss any of his ministers
option2: He is responsible to the Parliament
option3: Prime Minister is the nominal head of the Council of Ministers
option4: Prime Minister is the real head of the Council of Ministers
answer: Prime Minister is the real head of the Council of Ministers
explanation: According to the Article 74(1) of the Constitution \"there shall be a Council of Ministers with the Prime Minister at the head to aid and advise the President who shall, in exercise of his functions act in accordance with such advice\". Thus the real power is vested with the Prime Minister.
